title: Portfolio
text:
Projects





Market Segmentation Analysis App 



Performing Market/Customer segmentation analysis using different cluster algorithms. Also involves data downloads and segmentation summary.


Tool: R


Category: Segmentation Analysis.



  







Market Basket Analysis App 



Selecting various similar purchased goods into a group with dashboards and recommendation of basket goods.


Tool: Python


Category: Segmentation.




  







Hotel Management Dashboard 



Breaks down revenue, reservations and guest activities with key insight for making informed decisions.



  







PM2.5 Sensor Offset Prediction 



Using Machine Learning to predict particle matter (PM2.5) Sensor offset faults
